en: Your first companion. Clicking makes it sing.
Adds a second pitch with call-and-response.
Adds a harmony tone to the chorus.
Adds a bass-like croak for depth.
A rare sparkling frog with glowing call.
Glowing particles bring the scene to life.
Fills the scene with lush foliage.
A shimmering sky full of stars.
A magical aurora illuminates the night.
Boosts frog calls during a short rainfall.
Doubles frog call rate briefly with echo FX.
Summons twinkling stars and click bonuses.
This is a visual/audio experience. Adjust volume before continuing.
